entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
